review: I was disappointed the fire stick doesn't supply captions.  I am deaf and since netflix also has no captions we were hoping the fire stick would provide captioning.  Set up was fairly easy and the movie list is impressive.  Most of our favorite BBC programs are at no added charge on netflix but must be purchased on the fire stick.  The closed captioning was what we were looking for.
